If you have an Expedia Rewards account, please book with the same email address and your points will automatically post after your stay. Please note that it may take up to 30 days for your points to appear.
Total hotel charges, including taxes, are billed at hotel.
Your credit card will be charged %s
This removes all saved billing and contact information.
This will log you out and remove all saved billing and contact information.
Please enter a value for this field.
Please enter a valid value for this field.

Sorry, payments in this currency (%s) are not supported by American Express. Please use a different credit card.
You must accept the terms to book
Could not connect to Expedia servers. Please check your connection and try again.
Your hotel room has been booked and reserved. However, there were the following errors: %s
We are unable to send a confirmation email.
If you have questions about your reservation, please call Expedia at %s.
Your credit card will be charged immediately for the full amount of the reservation upon booking.

We are offering an exceptionally low rate on this property. In order to do so, we must make this a non-refundable rate. If you choose to cancel this reservation, you will not be refunded any of the payment.
Your credit card will be charged a deposit for your reservation. Your credit card will be charged directly by the hotel when your reservation is placed.
Credit card information is required in order for us to guarantee your reservation. Your credit card will not be charged until your arrival at the hotel or the cancellation deadline has passed.

By proceeding with this reservation, you agree to all terms and conditions, which include the Cancellation Policy and all terms and conditions contained in the User Agreement.\n\nYou agree to pay the cost of your reservation. If you do not pay this debt and it is collected through the use of a collection agency, a lawyer or through other legal proceedings, you agree to pay all reasonable costs or fees, including legal fees and court costs, incurred in connection with such collection efforts.

You are booking a non-discounted property. All rates displayed are nightly, and based on double occupancy per room unless otherwise specified. Carefully review the room descriptions and rate rules to ensure that the room you select can accommodate your entire party. Some rates may require special identification. Our booking fee, taxes and other surcharges imposed by the hotel are not included. Any extra adults or children above the room\'s listed occupancy may be subject to additional charges at the property\'s discretion.\n\nRequests for more than 2 people, or for more occupants than your selected rate indicates, will be sent to the hotel but are not guaranteed. If accepted, they will be subject to additional charges at the property\'s discretion.
Success! You are now logged in.
You have been logged out due to inactivity.
Are you sure you want to log out of your Expedia account?
Enter a coupon or promotion code
The stored credit card you are using is expired.
Here is my hotel reservation info:
We\'re here for you 24 hours a day.
Visit the website to book flights, cars, packages and more.
Let us know what you think about the app.
Drop us a line and we\'ll get back to you.
Like amazing hotel deals? Tell your friends about the app.

Hi there,

Try out Expedia Hotels for iPhone and Android phones. It's FREE and you can easily search and book rooms from over 140,000 hotels all over the world. It's the easiest way to book hotel rooms on your phone.

http://www.expedia.com/app
